p: The results of the hedonic evaluations are observed in Figure 13A during the four days of storage. Results show that the fruits with T2 had higher acceptance regarding aroma attributes and flavor, with a significant difference ( p < 0.05); however, the analysis of texture perception and color was higher in T4 but did not present a significant difference when compared to the treatments that have essential oil. Regarding day 7 of storage ( Figure 13B), fruits with T2 had a greater acceptance of the sensory attributes evaluated against the treatments with essential oil.
